title: What Does HGW Mean? Plus, How to Take a Hot Girl Walk

steps.title: HGW stands for ‚ÄúHot girl walk‚Äù on social media and in texts.
steps.content: HGW stands for ‚ÄúHot girl walk‚Äù on social media and in texts. An HGW, or hot girl walk, is an online trend to take a daily stroll outdoors. [1] X Research source The purpose of the hot girl walk is to feel confident, motivated, and good about yourself while getting fresh air and exercise. You might post pictures or videos of your HGW on TikTok or Instagram or text your friends to invite them on an HGW. [2] X Research source Examples of using HGW online and in texts: ‚ÄúFeeling so good after my HGW today! üòä I walked 5 miles! üí™‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a beautiful day for an HGW! ‚òÄÔ∏èüå≥ü©∑‚Äù ‚ÄúDo you want to come on my HGW with me? We can get coffee after! ‚òïÔ∏è‚Äù You don‚Äôt have to be a girl to take an HGW! Anyone of any gender identity can take a hot girl walk and feel its confidence-boosting benefits.

steps.title: The hot girl walk was created by Mia Lind on TikTok in 2021.
steps.content: The hot girl walk was created by Mia Lind on TikTok in 2021. During the coronavirus pandemic in 2020, Mia Lind started taking daily walks to get outside and boost her mental health. In January 2021, she posted her first video describing her walks, which she called hot girl walks, on her TikTok account @exactlyliketheothergirls. [3] X Research source The hot girl walk trend exploded on TikTok after Lind‚Äôs video and quickly followed to other social media sites like Instagram and YouTube. Lind regularly plans group hot girl walks and events in major cities. Other people have started their own hot girl walk clubs.

steps.title: Take a daily walk outside, like around your neighborhood or a park.
steps.content: Take a daily walk outside, like around your neighborhood or a park. Getting fresh air is one of the main goals of taking a hot girl walk. So, simply take a stroll around your neighborhood. Or, go to a park, hike a trail, or walk in a scenic area of your town. You might also go on a hot girl walk to grab coffee or run some errands. [4] X Research source A hot girl walk can be as long or short as you want! Hot girl walk creator Mia Lind says her walks are traditionally 4 miles (6.4 km) long. It‚Äôs totally fine to take your hot girl walk inside. Simply jump on a treadmill or walking pad or walk around your local shopping center. Feel free to walk alone or stroll with your friend or a pet. Stretch before and after you go on a walk . Make sure to hydrate during your walk, too. [5] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: Think about your goals, confidence, and what you‚Äôre grateful for.
steps.content: Think about your goals, confidence, and what you‚Äôre grateful for. According to the creator Mia Lind, the purpose of the hot girl walk is to focus on yourself instead of the other things going on in your life. She recommends focusing on 3 things as you walk: [6] X Research source Reflect on your goals : Ask yourself how well you‚Äôre progressing on your goals and if they‚Äôre aligned with your values and needs. Then, revise your goals or set new goals . [7] X Research source Feel confident and hot: Hype yourself up and practice self-love as you walk! Think about all your amazing qualities, talents, and accomplishments. Challenge your beliefs by replacing your negative thoughts with positive ones . [8] X Trustworthy Source National Health Service (UK) Public healthcare system of the UK Go to source Think about what you‚Äôre grateful for : Focus on the little things that bring you joy, like the breeze in your hair or the delicious meal you had for lunch. Give thanks for all the wonderful things in your life, like your family, friends, or job. [9] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source

steps.title: Listen to music or a podcast.
steps.content: Listen to music or a podcast. Put on your headphones and cue up a playlist that matches the energy you want to cultivate as you walk. For instance, listen to upbeat, empowering music or a calming and meditative playlist. Or, put on your favorite podcast. [10] X Research source Search for ‚ÄúHot girl walk playlist‚Äù on Spotify, Apple Music, or YouTube for inspiration on what to listen to as you walk. Alternatively, leave your headphones at home and simply listen to the sounds around you as you walk.

steps.title: Wear an outfit that makes you feel good.
steps.content: Wear an outfit that makes you feel good. Put on something that boosts your confidence for your hot girl walk, whether that‚Äôs an oversized t-shirt and joggers , a crop top and bike shorts , or a matching workout set . Just make sure whatever you wear is comfortable, breathable, and wicks away moisture. [11] X Research source Wear comfortable walking or running shoes that have good arch support for your hot girl walk, too. Put on sunglasses or a hat and apply sunscreen to protect yourself against the sun. If you‚Äôre walking at night, wear reflective clothing or carry a flashlight with you. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Improves your mood.
steps.content: Improves your mood. Taking a brisk walk every day is a great way to boost your mental health . Walking can lower your stress, release tension, and help you feel happier. It can also reduce symptoms of depression, anxiety, and loneliness. [13] X Research source In general, walking at a faster pace is associated with greater health benefits. A brisk walk is considered to be around 3 miles per hour (4.8 kph). It‚Äôs okay if you can‚Äôt walk that fast or that far immediately. Start slow and steady to make walking a routine and build your strength. Walking is one of the most popular forms of exercise because it‚Äôs free and requires no special equipment.

steps.title: Boosts your energy.
steps.content: Boosts your energy. Walking increases your blood flow and brings more oxygen to your brain, which helps wake you up and feel more energized . It also releases endorphins in your body which help you feel refreshed and motivated. [14] X Research source Going for a daily hot girl walk also improves your stamina, giving you more energy to do other tasks. [15] X Trustworthy Source American Heart Association Leading nonprofit that funds medical research and public education Go to source

steps.title: Improves your general health.
steps.content: Improves your general health. Hot girl walks are great for your physical health and wellness. Regular walks help strengthen your bones and muscles and improve your general fitness, which can help you maintain a healthy weight. Walking can also promote better memory and help you sleep more soundly . [16] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source Walking can also help you live a longer life! [17] X Research source

steps.title: Prevents diseases.
steps.content: Prevents diseases. Walking is great for your heart health and has been shown to lower your risk for heart disease, strokes, and high blood pressure. It also helps regulate your blood sugar and can decrease your risk for diabetes. [18] X Research source Taking daily walks can also reduce the risk of developing certain cancers, like breast cancer. [19] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source

steps.title: Strengthens your immune system.
steps.content: Strengthens your immune system. Going for a daily hot girl walk can reduce your chances of getting sick from common illnesses like the cold or flu. If you do get sick, walking can lower the severity of your sickness and reduce the amount of time you‚Äôre sick. [20] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source

steps.title: Herzlichen gl√ºckwunsch
steps.content: Herzlichen gl√ºckwunsch For German speakers, HGW is an acronym that stands for ‚ÄúHerzlichen gl√ºckwunsch,‚Äù which means congratulations. You might see people typing HGW online to congratulate others on an engagement, graduation, or job promotion. [21] X Research source

steps.title: Horde Gone Wild
steps.content: Horde Gone Wild To people who play the video game World of Warcraft , HGW stands for ‚ÄúHorde gone wild.‚Äù This refers to a large group of enemies that are difficult to defeat. [22] X Research source HGW can also be used in other video games where you come into contact with large, chaotic groups of enemies.

steps.title: Hidden gene woma
steps.content: Hidden gene woma Snake lovers might use HGW as a shorthand for ‚ÄúHidden gene woma.‚Äù This refers to a special pattern that appears on ball pythons if they have this mutation. In some cases, it can also cause ball pythons to wobble or shake. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Holy Grail War
steps.content: Holy Grail War For fans of the anime Fate , HGW stands for ‚ÄúHoly Grail War.‚Äù In the show, the Holy Grail War is a competition that grants the winner of the game 1 wish. [24] X Research source

steps.title: Hillbilly Gone Wild
steps.content: Hillbilly Gone Wild Some people online use HGW to stand for ‚ÄúHillbilly gone wild.‚Äù A hillbilly describes a person who is from a rural area or town. So, someone might text their friends ‚ÄúHGW‚Äù when they see another person being noisy or rowdy. Avoid calling someone a hillbilly, as is typically seen as an offensive term or insult.
